column2:
"You are incredible as I expected!
I don't think I can ever beat you!"

"I will try to catch up with you in 200
years!"

"Urm, of course I'm referring to Magic
and not about mind and spirit..."

"Thanks for the help every time!
I have decided to go for it at one shot
from here!"

"さすがだぜ！
おたくに勝る手本はねーな！"

"２００年どころか一瞬で
つかませてもらったぜ！"

"あ、もちろんテクニカルな話で
心意気の話じゃねーけどな……"

"いつもありがとうな！
ここらで一発オレもドカンとキメるぜ！"
